head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAPKIN, CLARA, DDS.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAPKIN, CLARA, DDS.

block.p: RAPKIN-Clara, DDS. Clara Rapkin's family celebrates her life. She was a pioneer woman Dentist, NYU Dental School Class of 1936, and a founding member of the Women's Dental Association. Dear sister of Fredda Lautkin, nephews Robert, Everett, Andrew & Jeffrey Lautin. Also, Ellie, Rita & Paul Schaffer will miss her.
